contentList.content: Strike with your weapon wreathed in golden light, illuminating your target and preventing it from turning <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> for [1] turns.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with this blade have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against Lightly or Heavily Obscured targets.
